Uses of Package
org.dotplot.ui.monitor

Packages that use org.dotplot.ui.monitor
org.dotplot.fmatrix F-Matrix classes. 
org.dotplot.image Contains all classes needed for the imaging module. 
org.dotplot.ui.monitor Classes for the progress monitor. 
 

Classes in org.dotplot.ui.monitor used by org.dotplot.fmatrix
MonitorablePlotUnit
          MonitorablePlotUnit must be implemented by anyone who wants to give information about progress.
 

Classes in org.dotplot.ui.monitor used by org.dotplot.image
MonitorablePlotUnit
          MonitorablePlotUnit must be implemented by anyone who wants to give information about progress.
 

Classes in org.dotplot.ui.monitor used by org.dotplot.ui.monitor
DotPlotProgressDialog
          DotPlotProgressDialog shows two progressbars and should only be used by DotPlotProgressMonitor.
DotPlotProgressDialog.ThreadAwareCallback
           
DotPlotProgressMonitor
          DotPlotProgressMonitor is a Singleton that manages the DotPlotProgressDialog.
MonitorablePlotUnit
          MonitorablePlotUnit must be implemented by anyone who wants to give information about progress.
